quotes.quote: A word that has been said may be unsaid--it is but air. But when a deed is done, it cannot be undone, nor can our thoughts reach out to all the mischiefs that may follow.
With love, you should go ahead and take the risk of getting hurt because love is an amazing feeling.
Trying and getting hurt can't possibly be worse for you than being... stuck.
It seems everyone's so worried about getting hurt that they forget about letting love happen.
Let him tell us he's never been hurt, but that's the definition of getting hurt.
Growing up is all about getting hurt. And then getting over it. You hurt. You recover. You move on. Odds are pretty good you're just going to get hurt again. But each time, you learn something.
Here's my heart and soul, please grind them into hamburger, and enjoy.
Who do you run to, to stop the tears, when the only person who can, is the one who caused the hurt.
Break up in its final moments.
Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.
You've hurt my feelings, you've broken my heart. I gave you my time, I gave you my trust but you left me for another.
A stiff apology is a second insult. . . The injured party does not want to be compensated because he has been wronged; he wants to be healed because he has been hurt.
I tell kids that people will let them down and people will hurt them. But Jesus Christ will never let them down and never hurt them.
Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
The difference between friendship and love is how much you can hurt each other.

The truth that many people never understand, until it is too late, is that the more you try to avoid suffering the more you suffer because smaller and more insignificant things begin to torture you in proportion to your fear of being hurt
Sometimes we guard people from the truth to protect them from being hurt, but by doing that we only hurt them more in the long run.
Of all pains, the greatest pain, is to love, and to love in vain.
I search, but never find. Hurt, but never cry. I work and forever tired.
Anger is just a cowardly extension of sadness. It's a lot easier to be angry at someone than it is to tell them you're hurt.

Hurt is a part of life. To be honest, I think hurt is a part of happiness, that our definition of happiness has gotten very narrow lately, very nervous, a little afraid of this brawling, fabulous, unpredictable world.
I thought you were gone forever, I thought you'd walked away from everything, because I failed, because I destroyed the only thing that ever mattered to me. I waited for you to come, but you didn't.
I still own my heart, which I know because it hurts so much.
Forgive others, not because they deserve forgiveness, but because you deserve peace.
The person you're meant to be with will never have to be chased, begged, or given an ultimatum.
It's okay to not be perfect. It's okay to make mistakes. It's okay to do something that you wish you hadn't done, because if we don't do those things we never grow.
Until we have seen someone's darkness, we don't really know who they are. Until we have forgiven someone's darkness, we don't really know what love is.
Often it's the deepest pain which empowers you to grow into your highest self.
